Package org.apache.lenya.cms.authoring

Interface Summary
NodeCreatorInterface Deprecated. This interface and it's implementations will be removed during the 1.4 development cycle
 

Class Summary
DefaultBranchCreator Default creator for Documents of type branch (ie, they can have child documents)
DefaultCreator Base creator for creating documents
NewBlogEntryCreator Creator a blog entry
 

Exception Summary
CreatorException The creator exception
